author: Anonymous Atom
title: Passing course grade
question: Hi, I just wondered about this course. I think the passing grade is higher than 45% because there is information about 45% in syllabus. Is it right?
student_answer:
From the syllabus:
You must pass the lab component to pass the course. Any student who fails the lab component will receive a grade of no higher than
45
%
for the course.
You must pass the combined average of midterm
2
and the final exam to pass the course. Any student who fails the combined average of these two exams will receive a grade of no higher than
45
%
for the course.
Passing the course requires
50
%
in total.
